# shinyenv

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

An experimental package to capture and reroute dangerous Shiny function calls.

## Installation

You can install the development version of shinyenv from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("shinyworks/shinyenv")
```
